description: The head butcher is away and his men are up to no good. Luke Riley and Jesse Alan discover DJ tied up in a cage, and they want to have some fun with him. They rip off his clothes, rough him up, and make him suck their cocks. Poor DJ gets suspended upside down and receives heavy flogging in all directions. Luke and Jesse finish him off with a nasty enema and a hard bondage fuck.
title: The Slaughterhouse: Part 2
